nodes.text: Deagan Farrell was a Human male Mandalorian who worked on Vaiken Spacedock with fellow bounty hunter trainer, Bulga, during the Cold War and the Galactic War.

Deagan Farrell awards players of the Bounty Hunter class their class rewards at the end of the three main chapters of the class storyline in Star Wars: The Old Republic. Farrell's last name is only mentioned in the game's mission logs and not on the character's in-game name plaque.
